item.title: Catalyst Housing Limited
item.description: Catalyst is major housing association in the U.K. with over 37000 homes in London and the Home Counties. It is a member of the G15 group.

item.title: Clarion Housing Group
item.description: Clarion is the largest social landlord in the United Kingdom, with 125,000 properties across more than 170 local authorities. It has come under particular flack for conditions in its housing stock, and was a particular noted focus in the Levelling Up, Housing, and Communities Committee’s report into the subject.

item.title: London & Quadrant Housing Trust
item.description: L&Q (London & Quadrant Housing Trust) is a housing association operating in Greater London, the South East, East Anglia, and parts of the North West (under its subsidiary company Trafford Housing Trust).

item.title: Peabody Group
item.description: Founded in 1862, Peabody is one of London’s oldest and largest housing associations with around 55,000 properties across London and the South East.
